name: Fly Butterfly Necklace in Bronze (signed original)
description:
One of a Kind Butterfly!  I made this beauty in my studio.  No two will ever be the same.  Each butterfly has been hand made and hand stamped and individually signed.

I hand wrote "Fly" on the back to remind us that we all can fly away from the little things that weigh us down, and we can fly to new heights!

This butterfly measures approximately 1 3/8 inches across the top of his wings and approximately 1 inch tall.

The necklace is 16" with a 2 inch extension chain with a single white dangling pearl on the end.  The chain is Vintaj brass.

FLY!

name: Fly Away With Me To A Sunny Place Necklace (Signed original)
description:
A Bronze Butterfly floats on your neck accompanied by 6 dangling stones.  A tiny freshwater pearl completes the look in the back.

I designed and hand crafted the bronze butterfly in my studio.  On the back I hand wrote "FLY."  A reminder that we all can fly, if only in our hearts.

I wired on 6 stones, 2 dyed lemon yellow chalcedony with gold vermeil bali style beads, and 4 carnelian beads.  

The bronze chain is Vintaj Brass.
  
Necklace is 16 inches long with a 2 inch extension chain.

name: Pearl Necklace with a Wavy Twist!  Not your mother's pearl necklace.
description:
This is a bold and beautiful freshwater pearl necklace.  I took large, white, freshwater pearl and strung them on non-tarnish silver wire along with silver plated wavy beads for an elegant look.  

These are big, beautiful pearls measuring approximately 10 to 11 mm in length.  

There is a sturdy sterling extension chain at the clasp.  This necklace adjusts from 16 to 18 inches in length.

Matching earrings are available and are not included with this necklace.

name: Chocolate Brown Leather and Pearl Necklace
description:
Love the contrast of leather and pearls?  So do I.  I took white freshwater pearls and hand knotted them on a soft chocolate brown greek leather.  

Not your mother's pearls, but equally pretty.  Easy and fun to wear.

Finishes at the back with a hand made hook and 2 inch sterling silver extension chain.  

Adjustable from 16 to 18 inches.

Pearls vary in size.  Approximately 8mm size.

name: Pastel Stone Necklace on Sterling Silver Chain
description:
This necklace reminds me of the ocean.  Lovely, matt finished stones are wire wrapped together with sterling silver wire and then suspended on a heavy weight sterling silver chain with a heavy lobster claw clasp. 

16 inches long with a 2 inch sterling extension chain.  (You can make it shorter by clasping it further up the chain.)

Perfect for everyday or a beach wedding!

One of a kind, just like the person who wears it!
